entry.title: WIND WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 11:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
